global.keymap_def_alt_warning: Press ${ansi_bold}w${ansi_norm}/${ansi_bold}W${ansi_norm} to move forward/backward through ${ansi_yellow}warning${ansi_norm} messages
global.keymap_def_scroll_horiz: Press \'${ansi_bold}>${ansi_norm}\' or \'${ansi_bold}<${ansi_norm}\' to scroll horizontally to a search result
global.keymap_def_next_user_mark: Press ${ansi_bold}u${ansi_norm}/${ansi_bold}U${ansi_norm} to move forward/backward through user bookmarks
global.keymap_def_db_view: Press ${ansi_bold}v${ansi_norm}/${ansi_bold}V${ansi_norm} to switch to the SQL result view
global.keymap_def_hist_view: Press ${ansi_bold}i${ansi_norm}/${ansi_bold}I${ansi_norm} to switch to the histogram view
global.keymap_def_text_view: Press ${ansi_bold}t${ansi_norm} to switch to the text view
